title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 61-4.6 - Blaster's examining board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 61-4.6 - Blaster's examining board

State Regulations

The commissioner shall appoint an examining board, which
shall consist of at least three members. In addition to the requirements of
section
61-1.6
of this Part, at least one
member of such board shall be a certified blaster and at least one other member
of such board shall be a representative of explosive
manufacturers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
61-4.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
